originalText.text: This company acts as if it's a scam.  I would give it 0 stars if that would be possible.  As a new customer I thought this would be a great place to start my business, but I had to cancel my subscription soon after.  It has been over a month and I still have not receive what my clients paid me.  When I reached out to them about this issue, I was told I would receive my payout 3 months after I cancel the subscription.  What legit company does that?!

originalText.text: Terrible experience I was charged to $250 for reason I’m going to have to cancel my PayPal account now after doing some research I’m finding out that WordPress is a much better and much cheaper solution. Lessons learned. Perhaps you can learn from mine! :-)

originalText.text: My account has been hacked twice in less than 2 months where someone else is getting my payments. The first time was November and my payment has not been resolved. The second time was 12/23. Getting help is practically impossible!

originalText.text: The website features are inferior to WordPress. I therefore moved my sites off of Wix; now they are giving excuses for not cancelling may account and I therefore had to cancel the credit card.

originalText.text: Wix doesn't even let me find a way to submit email or error requests so I had to come to google reviews to let them know the 'Support' and help interface sucks.
